LanguageData.ARA_DormancyVat.label: Arachne dormant cocoon
LanguageData.ARA_DormancyVat.description: It is a special biological facility for storing surplus insects of Arachne insects.The insects stored inside enter a dormant state where they neither age nor die, waiting to be called again from the main nest.
LanguageData.ARA_RefuelingVat.label: essence extraction chamber
LanguageData.ARA_RefuelingVat.description: It is a specialized biological construct that can hold prisoners of the Arachne bugs. It uses a slow and painful method to extract genetic material and convert it into an essence that the bugs can use.\n\n——Please don't ask how we do it.
